data.text: @zerohedge @msumak The unintended consequences from the bleeding heart good intention decisions. The results of many government programs are often worse than the problem. A perfect example of the left's inability to critically think.
@tobymgreen and then little Toby took his ball and went home... #blockparty #lamarcusneverlovedyou

@zerohedge @thefreerifleman 
High unemployment helps expand the welfare state. Everything's falling neatly into place. (Maniacal laugh.)
@tobymgreen Haha! the Biebs has 67.2 million more followers than u. Logic says u have none. #lamarcusaspur4life #howplyisyourcollegedegree?
@Moron_tree33 well asshole, that is 230 more followers then you.  Apparently you can't follow logic. Take care or not.
@tobymgreen @zerohedge pretty sure you're arguing against yourself here... Re: your 1st argument that mcd's close when COMPUTERS introduced.
@tobymgreen @zerohedge bro, u taught me mcd's demand is based on their employee supply. You're clearly in Mensa...
@tobymgreen @zerohedge who said anything about NO humans? Pretty dense interpretation even from a guy w/240 whopping followers. #2guys1fry
@Moron_tree33 @zerohedge much like grocery stores. Computers are used to expand opportunity not restrict.
@Moron_tree33 @zerohedge there would be no residual income coming in.  Think Henry Ford and his cars.  Same model applies.
@Moron_tree33 @zerohedge oh hell, I am feeling generous and you have 12 followers.  If there were no humans working at McDonald's...
@Moron_tree33 @zerohedge when did it suddenly become my problem to teach you supply and demand?
@tobymgreen @zerohedge does doubling workforce then naturally double their demand, too? I'd assign 2 workers to every French fry...
@zerohedge aw a supply side view of the world.  Cause you know laying off your own workers is always smart.
@Moron_tree33 @zerohedge @chifightfor15 @15NowPDX @15noworegon and why this whole fucking post is a joke
@Moron_tree33 @zerohedge @chifightfor15 @15NowPDX @15noworegon that's why McDonald's hasn't replaced workers yet.
@Moron_tree33 @zerohedge @chifightfor15 @15NowPDX @15noworegon if they lay of their workforce they cut their own demand.
@tobymgreen @zerohedge @chifightfor15 @15NowPDX @15noworegon ya, show me any company that's been able to successfully integrate COMPUTERS...
@zerohedge @JeffLee2020 Robotize wherever possible. Only way to keep cheap food bizs going... unless ppl accept less beef/chicken/fish/etc.
@zerohedge @Jonatha72047218 - Wait! Did @POTUS say "creating" jobs, or "crating" jobs?! Better play that tape back...
@zerohedge As predicted in the film "Idiocracy" http://t.co/UAvTTkeNsX
@zerohedge Here is another pic if they do use computers @chifightfor15 @15NowPDX  @15noworegon http://t.co/615NmoSMJr
@zerohedge the problem isn't rising minimum wage, it's that there already aren't enough jobs for everyone to work 40 hours bc automation
